name: ent
readme: ent === Encode and decode HTML entities example ======= var ent = require('ent'); console.log(ent.encode('©moo')) console.log(ent.decode('π & ρ')); output: <span>©moo</span> π & ρ methods ======= encode(str) ----------- Escape unsafe characters in `str` with html entities. decode(str) ----------- Convert html entities in `str` back to raw text. credits ======= HTML entity tables shamelessly lifted from perl's [HTML::Entities](http://cpansearch.perl.org/src/GAAS/HTML-Parser-3.68/lib/HTML/Entities.pm)
